name: Trencher Broadcasting Company
description: TBC uses AI to create viral media, including videos, memes, and interactive content, tailored to resonate with the crypto community, particularly on platforms like X, TikTok, and Telegram. The AI-generated content is designed to be shareable and attention-grabbing, aligning with 2025’s trend of AI-powered media in crypto marketing, where personalized and engaging content drives virality. Posts on X highlight TBC’s focus on “next-level AI media” and its potential to “flip” traditional media like Fox News through innovative content strategies.
